TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but its newfound abundance makes it unvalued.

I wish for a Mint Oreo Blizzard from Dairy Queen.

Granted, but you choke on it and die slowly.

I wish I had a Kaze Katana: http://www.sword-buyers-guide.com/kaze-katana-review.html

Granted, but you kill yourself with it by accident

I want a pony

Granted, you are given Sarah Jessica Parker.

I want a cubic metre of air.

Granted, but it is in deep space

I want a real life Mk1 command pod

Granted, even the 10km fall without chute you do with it and the smiling Jebediah next to you is real...

I wish I could divide by zero and get a nobel prize for it

Granted, now you can divide by zero. All the mystery is gone, replaced by a law that states that anything divided by zero is the same as multiplying it by 10^c. Yay. Also, for some reason your try to eat your Nobel Prize...

I wish I could create black holes by writing 'xx divided by zero'.

Granted, but the black hole is a small one at the centre of your stomach.

I wish for the ability to think up of wishes easily.

Granted, but they\'re worthless.

I wish for unlimited wishes.

Granted, but they are all the same wish, causing you to go insane.

I wish I was in Italy at this very moment.

Granted, you are placed in the middle of the Vesuvio crater.

I wish for a wish that backlashes on me.

Granted, but it only backlashes you a little, leading to dissapointment.

I wish for the pain of life to be gone.

Granted, you are forced to listen to Justin Bieber and watch My Little Pony until you are indoctrinated to love both, they take all of your time, and you live for 80+ years doing so.

I wish for a booster-powered bicycle.

Granted, yet it explodes with you on it

i wish to go see skrillex again, and his mixer doesn\'t break this time

Granted, but he uses the mixer to attack you.

I wish for a Pie!

Granted, but you are the pie, and i eat you! lol

i wish for flux pavilion to do announce another tour

Granted, but it\'s one straight to Croydon.

I wish to eat myself...

Ha! Corrupt that!

granted, but you give up while still eating your fingernails.

i wish to have no weakness

Granted, but you also lose all strengths.

I wish to be on a train right now.

Granted, you are literally on top of the train, and it goes through a tunnel *SPLAT*

I wish for a plush kerbal.
Granted, but it comes to life, builds a rocket and smashes it into your face.
I wish for the above user to learn how to play this forum game.

Granted. Simple. You don\'t actually get anything though.

I wish to be INSIDE a train right now.

OOG: AAAAAAAH I FORGOT MY WISH! AAAH

IG:

Granted, but the meaning of inside has changed to above and you hit another tunnel. Splat.

I wish that Ascensiam would have told me to edit my post through steam.

Granted, he tells you all of your mistakes now but only if it is already too late.

I wish Kirby whould eat nooblet
